back: Collections of measurements, characteristics, or facts about a group.
The process of extracting meaning from data.
A collection of one or more pieces of information collected about a single individual or entity.
Particular characteristics, measurements, or facts that make up a data point.
Individual piece of information in a data set. While a variable typically represents unprocessed or raw data, features can include both variables and processed versions of the variables.
A question that can be answered using research, including data collection and analysis.
